about.p1: My name is Franco Gutiérrez. I am a highly experienced freelance software developer with over 3 years of hands-on experience working with clients and companies from all around the world.
about.p2: I specialize in building modern web, mobile, and desktop applications using up-to-date technologies. I’m passionate about creating efficient, scalable, and user-focused digital solutions.
about.p3: Throughout my freelance career, I’ve successfully developed custom sales systems, corporate websites, and cross-platform web applications for small and medium-sized businesses across different industries.
about.p4: In addition to project work, I actively engage in tech communities and programming events, including meetup talks and regional hackathons. I strongly believe in the value of sharing knowledge to help grow our industry.
